name: Notification Bar
description: Show a notification bar for your users

config.markdown:
## MANUAL STEP NOTICE: This app needs to injects code into your website through posthog-js. You need to **opt-in** on your site to enable this behaviour.

```
posthog.init("api_key", {
  "api_host": "https://app.posthog.com",
  "opt_in_site_apps": true,
})
```

config.name: Domains
config.hint: Comma separated list of domains to activate on. Leave blank to enable all. For example: "localhost,app.posthog.com"

config.name: HTML to show in the notification bar
config.default: ðŸš€ Product 2.0! is out! Click here to learn more.

config.name: Remember close
config.hint: Remember if the user has closed the notification bar, and don't show it again. This resets if you update the notification bar's text.
